hero.descriptionHero: I'm moving into software development after experience in systems analysis. I'm eager to contribute to innovative projects and grow my skills. Let's connect!

about.title: About
about.description1: I'm moving into full-stack development, focusing on technologies like React, Node.js, and JavaScript to build efficient web applications.
about.description2: Currently in system management and support, I'm aiming to transition into software development to work on impactful solutions.
about.description3: I'm passionate about building tools that make an impact. My goal is to focus on coding, problem-solving, and improving efficiency.

experiences: Worked on network and server maintenance
Completed multiple projects using JavaScript, React, and Node.js
Developed a user management system as a final project
